item.description: Table of Contents How to show top 20 largest files from the command line Show all ports open on a machine Find your internal ip address Create a user and add it to a group How to show top 20 largest files from the command line sudo du -a / | sort -n -r | head -n 20 Show all ports open on a machine nmap -sn <INTERNAL IP ADDRESS> Find your internal ip address ip addr Create a user and add it to a group # Create the new group sudo groupadd GROUPNAME # Add user to new group (requires you to logout after) sudo usermod -aG GROUPNAME $USER # See which groups you are a part off groups
